entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
